short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Draft Room Extension enriches your draft experience by pulling live updates of the selected players in your drafts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When the Draft Room Extension is enabled, you can paste the URL of your draft into draft-room.com, which will then receive live updates of selected players as they are taken off the board.

Additionally, the extension enables automatic pulling of daily rankings!
